attributes.action: make it compulsory for antifreeze suppliers to add the bitter chemical Bitrex or a similar agent to this and other toxic substances to make it taste repugnant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This a campaign to add Bitrex or similar to Anti-freeze to make it unpalatable to cats, wildlife and to humans.   There has been a spite of cat deaths including my cat Sooty form alleged anti-freeze poisoning and there was a recent notorious Nottingham case were a woman was sentenced to 30 years for putting anti-freeze in her husbands curry.  
 
It is difficult to estimate to impact of antifreeze poisoning on wildlife as squirrels and birds etc may also to attracted to drink it with fatal consequences.
 
Please could the Government act urgently and pass legislation tightening up on the manufacture, supply and disposal of anti-freeze and add an agent like to Bitrex to make this common chemical unpalatable.

"Public education is also important for people who are changing the cooling system in their cars to make sure they dispose of antifreeze correctly."
